definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[[אָחֵל]]], in pause [[אָםַחל]]Zec 14:5, acc. to LXX Targum Thes Ew al.,

definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: near Jerusalem; but no site found, & identification with [[בֵּית־הָאֵחֶל]] uncertain; hence Symm Vulgate Köh Wr make subst., [[אֶל־אָםַחל]] = very near, hard by ([[אָחֵל]] being the supposed abs. form of I. [[אֵחֶל]]; cf. Ol:§ 167 b).
